summary: "The Bourne Identity" is a 2002 action-thriller film about Jason Bourne, played by Matt Damon, who wakes up with amnesia and must fight to discover his true identity and his past with the CIA. Based on Robert Ludlum's novel, the film was directed by Doug Liman and faced many production challenges. It received positive reviews and was a box office success, leading to three sequels.
title: The Bourne Identity (2002 film)
